long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app calculates the remaining fantasy points for CBS nfl app. Its really headache to calculate remaining points and total points, this extension helps you to calculate remaining points and shows in blue color text, and also shows estimated total points.
